name: Gravity Cavity
description:
Gravity Cavity

Retrieve the ball thing from the depths of alien caves and return it to the sky.
Firing thrusters and ship destruction loses fuel. No fuel means Game Over.
Collect fuel and ball things with your tractor beam (RMB). Destroy alien turrets with your lasers (RMB) and use (LMB) to navigate the caves.

Made for ProcJam17 https://itch.io/jam/procjam
